data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Chao-Chun, Golovatch, Sergei I., Chang, Hsueh-Wen (2010): Revision of the endemic Taiwanese millipede genus Aponedyopus Verhoeff, 1939, with descriptions of two new species (Diplopoda, Polydesmida, Paradoxosomatidae). Advances in the systematica of Diplopoda III. ZooKeys 72: 1-21, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.72.743, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.72.743
